name: Encapsulated
description:
I was encapsulated by the evil Eye.

It was supposed to trap me in the past, but for some reason i still can go forward in time. I can even summon my past projection!!! The problem is my jailer keeps his eye on me... My deer friend, please help me!

(recommended to play in full screen mode) Controls: "A" & "D" or "←"& "→" to move "Space" to jump "Q" to use your "Past Projection" ability "Esc" to pause the game (or unpause)
